[h1] Half-Life: Opposing Force – взглянуть на события первой игры глазами морпех [/h1]

Half-Life: Opposing Force это второе дополнение к оригинальной Half-Life, которое рассказывает другую историю, которая связана общими сюжетними нитями с Чёрной Мезой и Гордоном Фрименом. Opposing Force был выпущен 1 ноября 1999 года. 

[list]


[*] В Half-Life: Opposing Force мы играем за Капрала Адриана Шепарда, одного из морпехов из отряда спецподразделения HECU. Он был отправлен в Аризону для того, чтобы найти Моргана Фримэна и арестовать его. Но не долетев до базы мы падаем на округ Мезы и начинаем отсюда свой путь. Сначала игра познакомит нас с хэдкрабами и оружием ближнего боя, а потом, постепенно, мы будем получать оружие с самого обычного Half-Life. Сюжет будет плавно развиваться, но полной понятности в сюжете нету, потому что все солдаты говорят что нам нужно бежать, а в итоге мы идём и делаем совсем другое. Возможно, это была проблема локализации, я надеюсь что это так.

Я думаю все играли в первую часть легендарной игры от Valve и все понимают какой там геймплей. Если вы даже не играли, то смотрели видео спидрана так точно. Так вот, распрыжку делать и летать по карте так же легко, как и стрелять. А стрельба на своё то время реально крутое, в некоторых шутерах 2019-го года нету такой же физики стрельбы. Впрочем, игра очень весёлая и навевает лишь положительные эмоции.

А вот что не хорошо, но это не хорошо вообще в первой части Half-Life, это твои союзники. Они настолько тупые, что ими можно кидаться как камнями. То они застревают в дверях, то они прут на турель и умирают. Помощи от них нету, потому что они могут вас подорвать на гранате, а потом ещё начнут по вам стрельбу. По истине один из глупейших ИИ в играх. Но это можно спереть на возраст игры.

Ещё что не то что взбесило, а скорее не понравилось, так это не очень то и нарастающая сложность. Она сначала нарастает постепенно, а потом в один момент становится так сложно, что игра бросает игроку реальный челленж и чтобы пройти её дальше придётся попотеть. 

[/list]

Вердикт:[i] это просто сногсшибательная игра, не смотря на её недостатки. Наверное, это одна из крутейших игр о военных и о пришельцах, которая когда либо выходила. Настолько динамичного геймплея никогда не ожидаешь в игре 1999-го года. Я бы назвал её вообще лучшей из серии Half-Life. Это что-то неземное. [/i]

Оценка:[b] 9.8/10.[/b] Лучшая из серии Half-Life и одна из лучших в своём роде.

Что в результате? Мы имеем отличный аддон от небольшой команды. Хотя он и вышел спустя год после оригинальной игры, прошедшее время не давит на него тяжелым грузом. Смена врага часто позволяет влить свежую кровь в нашу жизнь. А если врагом становится бывшее альтер эго в лице Фримена... В общем, если вы в свое время протащились от Half-Life, то Opposing Force — штучка явно для вас. Играть, черт возьми, интересно, не менее интересно, чем просто в Half-Life. А это — самое главное для аддона, не так ли?
Оценка 7.1/10

Лучшее дополнение сюжета для оригинальной Half-Life.
Blue Shift и Decay даже нет смысла сравнивать с Opossing Force.

Основными положительными сторонами игры являются:

- Сюжет ( Теперь мы играем не за  привычного нам "ученого" или какого-то "охранника" , а оперативника подразделения HECU - Адриана Шепарда, фамилия которого уже говорит о том что он не так прост , совершенно другая сторона участвующая в событиях исследовательского центра Black Mesa)

- Новые механики ( Возможность лазать по тросам)

- Новые противники ( Это  вам не Вортигонтов , Барнаклов , Хедкрабов убивать , а новую расу Х и следовательно нового босса)

- Новое вооружения ( Теперь вместо монтировки мы используем разводной ключ)

Excellent edition to the Half Life series. It's from the golden age of expansion packs, when it wasn't about cosmetic items and planned addons. Gear Box puts you in the boots of Adrian Shepherd, one of the HECU marines sent to clean up Black Mesa. The game features new weapons, allies, and foes. The core gameplay is the same, just the story is told from a different perspective.

Half-Life: Opposing Force is an awesome expansion pack to the original Half-Life, but this time from the point of view of a Marine named Cpl. Adrian Shepard. The events in this game run parallel to the original so it's great to see how the other storylines unfold from a different perspective. There are a load of new weapons added and also a few new enemies to encounter. If you're itching for more Half-Life then this is a must play and is an awesome addition to Half-Life series.

When compared to other expansion packs of it's era, Half-Life Opposing Force is one of the best. It adds various new weapons and enemies to the game that all fulfill a purpose and don't feel redundant. It also expands upon the story and adds a new layer of complexity to the Black Mesa Incident. If you enjoyed the original game then you will most certainly enjoy Opposing Force, it is one of the best products Gearbox has ever made and I highly recommend it.

Half-life opposing force was an expansion game to the half-life game series, that came to the fans that wanted more from half-life, after the success of the first half life. And like the first half life, this game succeed as well.

This game set in the area of time after Gordon freeman opened the portals to the aliens the enter to earth, and lets you see the story from a different point of view, as for the point of view of the US marines who came to destroy every sign of black mesa’s existence after the big incident.

In the game you play as admiral Shepard, a soldier which is part of the US marine, who came to destroy black mesa after the big incident, but his squad’s helicopter crashed, and he was left alone to try and get out of black mesa, with the goal of killing Gordon freeman in the way, but also to keep himself alive as much as he can.

The story of the new game is great and shows the reasons why the first half life was a great success, featuring great new levels with enemies and bosses to fight, and with new puzzle to think through like the first half life did.
  
Through the story you will encounter some new types of enemies and bosses that weren’t present in the first game, and get to use new sets of weapons, which a lot of them are fun to use. With that, because in this game you play as part of the US marines and not against them, like in the first half life, you get to regroup with soldier teammates that will help you to fight the aliens, and unlike the guards in the first half life, those US marines hold with them heavy and more damaging weapons like the SMG from the first half life, shotguns and even machine guns, while the guards in the first half life used only pistols, and could insist less amount of damage with that. Another new mechanic that wasn’t in the first half life and got added to this game is the ability to climb up ropes. Even know it fresh the mechanic of the game, I found it being more annoying then helpful in most situations, because of how similar it is to an enemy alien that will grab you up to kill you.

While the game was very fun, and keeps itself as quality as the first game in the series, the game still lacks consistency with the main character’s morals and goals. Because in the game I play as admiral Shepard, and his goals is to destroy black mesa, I should not help scientists and guards lives in my journey to escape black mesa, and instead arrest them or kill them instead of helping them so they would help me escape by opening locked doors like in the first half life. Another flaw in the game for me is that throughout the game you get to use more and more experimental and alien weapons, instead of more weapons that used in the US army. While those flaws minor, and doesn’t destroy the experience the first half life was known for, those still effect my thoughts about the story’s main character, Shepard, to see him less as a soldier that came to destroy the place, and more like another Gordon freeman. 

Another problem I faced is with the game’s mouse movement, which unlike the small story flaws I wrote before, this mouse movement problem is a big issue. the problem is that sometimes the crosshairs gets bugged when you move it, making it horrible to aim, and would make you sometimes get stuck for a long period of time on the same part of the level just because the crosshair gets bugged all the time and you can’t aim at the enemy because of it. This problem is even harder in multiplayer, in which the enemy players always jumping and moving, and those buggy crosshair movements are adding to the difficulty of aiming at them. 
Other than that, the game is a great game, and can live as a good expansion to the legacy of the first half life and of the half-life series as a whole, with great levels as the original gives, new complex puzzle levels to solve, great new weapons to experience with, and a masterpiece of a story.

Game pros and cons:
Pros:
-	Great level design.
-	A big diverse amount of fun weapons to use.
-	New and old enemies which are hard and worthwhile.
-	Great story.
-	Very good AI, to the enemies and to the allies.
-	Complex new and old mechanics.
-	New bosses to counter.

Cons:
-	Inconsistent character morals and motives.
-	 Some weapons don’t feet the character role in the game, and remind Gordon freeman more than the main character.
-	Not the freshest graphics (as a game that was made between 1999-2001)
-	Buggy mouse and crosshair control.
-	Short story (can be finished in about a day or so)
-	The multiplayer lacks even more from the buggy mouse and crosshair control.

Game’s settings:
-	First person shooter.
-	Science fiction.
-	Story focused game.
-	Cost 10$ (9.99$).
-	Violent game (contains blood).
-	Half horror half adventure type game.
-	Contains Puzzle levels.
-	Story length is about 9 hours.
-	Contains multiplayer.

*I give this game 7.9/10

Whatever happened to Shepard?

PROS: The game has all the polish and finesse of the original Half-Life.  If you enjoy the combat that came with it, this is a much better title, with fewer puzzles, less platforming, but more gun play.  The soundtrack still kicks in at some solid moments, providing tension to amp up the moment.

CONS: If you didn't like the combat in Half-Life, then this is not going to sell you on it.  It's mostly combat, and the problem comes about with a lot of small hallways.  This gives little room to dodge incoming fire.

FINAL: This is a nice little supplement to the original Half-Life story, weighed down only by it's questionable canon nature due to no consequence of the finale.  A fun game for old school FPS fans, but completely unneeded for the broader Half-Life story.

ALINTIDIR!
Gelmis gecmis en iyi 3 genisleme paketi arasina rahatlikla girecek mukemmel half life eklentisi.

Oyun valve tarafindan gelistirilmemesine ragmen orijinal senaryoyla ic ice gecen konu akisi, genel seri konusunu etkilememesi ancak black mesa'nin verdigi gercekcilik hissini gelistirebilmesi ile insanlarin seriye daha da baglanmasini saglamistir.

Opposing force'ta ilk oyunda yaratik - bilim adami herkesi temizlemeye gelen askerlerden birini oynariz. black mesa'da olaylar bas gostermis, gordon freeman ortalikta potansiyelini konusturmaya baslamis, biz de verilen gorevi (olaylari ortbas etmek) yerine getirmek icin ucaklarla black mesa'ya dogru ucarken xen'den gelen dev ucan yaratiklarin saldirisi nedeniyle ucagimiz black mesa yakinlarinda cakilinca hayatta kalmak icin mucadele etmeye baslariz.

Oyun cok basarili yeni yaratik dusmanlar ekler, ozgun bir boss'u vardir ve bu boss'u oldurmek icin seriye yakisir bir bulmaca sunmayi basarir.

Oyundaki asil can alici atraksiyon ise black mesa'ya girmemizden itibaren ilk oyunda oynadigimiz serinin ana karakteri gordon freeman'in cevrede bir yerlerde oldugu hissini devamli olarak vermesidir. bir mekana gireriz, orda bir pencerenin ardindan bir odayi goruruz. ilk oyunda o odada gordon freeman olarak bulunmusuzdur, hatirlariz. ilerleriz duvarin otesinden ayak sesleri duyariz, gordon freeman kosmaktadir. yani gordon biraz once baktigimiz odadan tam da biz bakmadan once cikmistir. en guzeli de tam gordon freeman xen'e isinlanmak uzere actigi portala atlarken portalin oldugu mekana girmemizdir. gordon'u arkadan gorur, kosarak portala atlarken izleriz. tek kelimeyle harika bir deneyimdir, biliriz gordon'un o ana kadar yaptiklarini, o portali nasil actigini, ne catismalardan gectigini. ne de olsa ilk oyunda biz yaptik onlari.

Sonuc olarak sundugu yeni silahlar, yeni dusmanlar, half life ile ic ice gecen bir zaman araliginda vuku bulmasi ve gordon freeman'in varligini her an hissettirebilmesi nedeniyle seri icin yapilabilecek daha iyi bir genisleme paketi dusunemiyorum. half life oynayip bunu oynamadiysaniz siktirin gidin gozum gormesin sizi. serrefsizler. oyuncuyuz diye geciniyosunuz bi de.
